Text:  Ciechanki-Kolonia [t͡ɕeˈxanki kɔˈlɔɲa] is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Puchaczów within Łęczna County Lublin Voivodeship in eastern Poland. It lies approximately 3 kilometres (2 mi) south of Puchaczów 7 km (4 mi) east of Łęczna and 28 km (17 mi) east of the regional capital Lublin.

Text:  Lipovica is a village in the municipality of Vlasotince Serbia. According to the 2002 census the village has a population of 454 people.

Text:  The ASK 21 is a glass-reinforced plastic (GRP) two-seater mid-wing glider aircraft with a T-tail. The ASK 21 is designed primarily for beginner instruction but is also suitable for cross-country flying and aerobatic instruction.
